ARABIC: وَلُوطًا إِذْ قَالَ لِقَوْمِهِۦٓ أَتَأْتُونَ ٱلْفَٰحِشَةَ مَا سَبَقَكُم بِهَا مِنْ أَحَدٍ مِّنَ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And Lut, when he said to his people, 'Do you commit an obscenity not perpetrated before you by anyone in all the worlds?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And We sent Lot, who said to his people: "Why do you commit this lecherous act which none in the world has committed before?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And remember when We sent Lot [as a Messeng to his people and he said to them: 'Do you realize you practise an indecency of which no other people in the world were guilty of before you?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Lot told his people, "Why do you commit such indecent acts that have never been committed by anyone before?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And We sent Lut – when he said to his people, “What! You commit the shameful acts which no one in the creation has ever done before you?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And (remember) Lut, when he said to his people: "Do you commit lewdness such as none preceding you has committed in all of the nations
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And (We sent) Lut when he said to his people: What! do you commit an indecency which any one in the world has not done before you?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And Lot, when he said to his people, 'What, do you commit such indecency as never any being in all the world committed before you?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And Lot! (Remember) when he said unto his folk: Will ye commit abomination such as no creature ever did before you?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We sent Lot, who said to his people, "How can you commit an abomination such as no one in the world has ever done before you?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And We sent Lut, when he said unto his people: commit ye an indecency wherewith none hath preceded you in the worlds?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And Lot, when he said to his people, ‘What! Do you commit an outrage none in the world ever committed before you?!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: We also (sent) Lut: He said to his people: "Do ye commit lewdness such as no people in creation (ever) committed before you?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And (remember) Lout (Lot), when he said to his people: "Do you commit the worst sin such as none preceding you has committed in the 'Alamin (mankind and jinns)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And Lot, who said to his nation: 'Do you commit such indecency (sodomy) in a way that no one has preceded you in the worlds?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And Lot, when he said to his people, “Do you commit lewdness no people anywhere have ever committed before you?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And [We had sent] Lot when he said to his people, "Do you commit such immorality as no one has preceded you with from among the worlds?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [7:80] And, mention, Lot (Lūtan is substituted by [the following, idh qāla]) when he said to his people, ‘Do you commit abomination, that is, [penetrating] the rears of men, such as no one in all the worlds ever committed before you, humans or jinn?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And Lot!) and We sent Lot to his people. (When he said unto his folk: Will ye commit abomination) i.e. sodomy (such as no creature ever did) this act (before you?)
